author: JumpingYang001
body: Add unit test for SessionStateInternal.Drives() about issue 64

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @JumpingYang001 I rebased on top of master to run the tests, and also fixed the `AssemblyLoadContext` part now that I fixed #690, so you'll want to  `git fetch; git checkout SessionStateInternalTest; git reset --hard origin/SessionStateInternalTest`, and then fix the test.

comments.author: JumpingYang001
comments.body: @andschwa could you help to merge to master for  #686 and #687 ? thank you!

title: Add unit test for SessionStateInternal.Drives() about issue 64
